--- title: "Dashboard with Shiny in Quarto" description: | A dashboard about Usbeks living in Germany according to their residence status and in comparison over the years, created in Quarto using Shiny.
author: "Fazliddin Sultonov" date: "2025-09-02" date-format: "MMM D, YYYY" filters: - lightbox lightbox: match: auto effect: none desc-position: top page-layout: full reference-location: margin categories: [quarto, dashboard, R, ggplot2, shiny, ggpol] # Code execute options execute: echo: true # Input anzeigen eval: true # Code ausführen freeze: true # never re-render during project render # Output format: html: theme: cosmo # codeb block code-fold: true code-line-numbers: true code-block-border-left: true link-external-newwindow: true # {target="_blank"} in doc # engine engine: knitr css: /customs/style.css # engine: knitr #jupyter: python3 # Chunk Options knitr: opts_chunk: comment: "#>" opts_knit: warning: false error: false --- ![](pics/uzdeplot.png) ::: {.cell} ::: In this project, a dashboard was created using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/). It shows the number of Uzbeks in Germany, according to their residence status and comparison over the years. :::: {.column-screen} ![](pics/db_col.png) ::::
**{{< fa solid database >}} Data Source:** *[©Statistisches Bundesamt (Destatis), 2025 | Stand: 31.07.2025](https://www-genesis.destatis.de/datenbank/online/)*
**{{< fa brands square-github >}} Code Source:** *[GitHub](https://github.com/sultanovf/uzbinde)*
**{{< fa solid square-share-nodes >}} Published on:** *[shinyapps.io](https://www.shinyapps.io/)*
